Synopsis:
---------
The Innkeepers will focus on the last two employees of a hotel before this closing its doors. After one hundred years in business, the Yankee Pedlar Hotel is about to close. His last two employees are Claire, a girl about twenty who has accepted his place in life, and Luke, an expert in computers and lonely boy. Both have the obsession that the hotel is cursed and are willing to prove it. Weather are pounces on days of operation, mysterious guests as Leanne Reese -Jones, a former TV actress converted into psychic and an old man who persists in staying in your room, the 353. Several strange events begin happen, and Claire and Luke must make the crucial decision on what to believe and not believe.
